meanings.definition: In a manner that is filled with anger or irritation.
meanings.sent1: She stomped fumingly out of the room after the argument.
meanings.sent2: He glared fumingly at his noisy neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed fumingly when it couldn't find its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds gathered fumingly in the sky before the storm.
meanings.sent5: Her eyes flashed fumingly as she confronted the rude customer.
